attributes.action: Stop spending money on other countries then raising our taxes!
attributes.additional_details: The people of this country are struggling hugely already, crippled not only be 14 years of Tory government but by a labour government that does not listen and has done nothing but go back on their manifesto, a manifesto they would not be in power today if people hadn’t voted on.
attributes.background: Income tax is expected to rise with the next budget among goodness knows what else. It is an insult to the British people to make us struggle even more so other countries don’t. Stop buying support from other countries because we’re too weak to say no.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Stop all overseas spending including foreign aid" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740913
